title: Endoscopic third ventriculostomy versus ventriculoperitoneal shunt in the treatment of hydrocephalus due to posterior fossa tumors in children: an updated meta-analysis.
abstract: This study aimed to compare endoscopic third ventriculostomy (ETV) and ventriculoperitoneal shunt (VPS) in managing obstructive hydrocephalus secondary to posterior fossa tumors in pediatric patients.
journal: Child's nervous system : ChNS : official journal of the International Society for Pediatric Neurosurgery
